name: Spies in Disguise
description: Play as all your favorite characters from the film, including Lance Sterling, Walter Beckett, and Marcy Kappel! You’ll travel the world, run through action-packed missions, and thwart the villains’ nefarious plans. Featuring beautifully-rendered environments inspired by the Spies in Disguise movie locations, each running challenge will unlock exciting spy gadgets like the wing suits, flame umbrellas, and more. This action running game also features exciting interstitial moments starring the characters from Blue Sky Studios’ hit film Spies in Disguise.
